## Layer.withOrder() method

Mutate the layer by setting the order.

**Signature:**

```typescript
withOrder(this: Layer<false>, order: number): Layer<true>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  this | [Layer](./alfa-cascade.layer.md)<!-- -->&lt;false&gt; |  |
|  order | number |  |

**Returns:**

[Layer](./alfa-cascade.layer.md)<!-- -->&lt;true&gt;

## Remarks

This actually mutates the layer, it does not create a new one. This is on purpose to automatically update all blocks using this layer.
